QuestData.Title: Stopping the Rituals
QuestData.Description: I could not help but overhear Illiyana's loss. I understand her need for revenge. I am wondering if while you are exacting it, you could do us a service?$B$BNo doubt you have already seen the satyr of Satyrnaar and Xavian conducting vile rituals. I believe that they are preparing their rituals to corrupt any of the night elves they capture, turning them into satyrs. We draenei also have problems with fel magic exposure.$B$BWould you disturb their ritual gems while you are there?
QuestData.RewardText: We are in your debt, $c.$B$BUnable to complete their nefarious rituals, the satyr are now fighting a losing battle where they are unable to replenish their numbers.
